Package controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControllerIF
    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControllerIF
    The Controller which connects the GUI and chosen game engine together using MVC model.
    Version:
    1.6 04.05.2021
    Author:
    Aki K, Tuomas R, Jere L, Ville R, Tatu N

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private EchoClient clientConnection
      Connection for the Chat server
      private DAOIF dao
      Current Data Access Object which is responsible for the handling of database CRUD methods
      private boolean gameStarted
      Boolean variable which tells if game is currently running, true means yes
      private ClientSocketHandler handler
      Socket handler for the chat connection
      private ModelIF model
      Current game engine class
      private Statistics stats
      Statistics class which takes the statistics from player and playedgame
      private ViewIF view
      Current Graphical User Interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void attemptLogIn()
      Gets email and password from View and checks from database if they are correct Changes current player in View if everything is fine.
      void attemptRegistration()
      Gets registration information from View and checks if they are okay Creates a new Player in database if everything checks out.
      void changePlayerInfo()
      Gets edited Player information from View and attempts to save them into database Updates the existing Player in database if everything checks out and then calls to show success message in view.
      void displayMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Appends a new chat message to the chat window in View
